{"id":1136957045,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2 days, 23 hours","timestamp":1704394765,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"114 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1136957045/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Minimum Number of Operations to Make Array Empty","memory":"85.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int minOperations(vector<int>& nums) {\n        unordered_map<int,int> count;\n        for(auto n:nums)\n            count[n]++;\n        int res = 0;\n        for(auto x:count)\n        {\n            if(x.second == 1)\n                return -1;\n            if(x.second % 3 ==0)\n                res+=(x.second/3);\n            else\n                res +=(x.second/3+1);\n        }\n        return res;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"minimum-number-of-operations-to-make-array-empty","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
